thread.title: Marc Marquez takes pole position for Australian Grand Prix
thread.title_full: Marc Marquez takes pole position for Australian Grand Prix

author: wtopstaff
title: Marc Marquez takes pole position for Australian Grand Prix
text:
Home » News » Sports » Marc Marquez takes pole… Marc Marquez takes pole position for Australian Grand Prix By The Associated Press October 17, 2015 2:08 am MotoGP rider Marc Marquez of Spain, center, holds up two fingers as he celebrates with Jorge Lorenzo of Spain, right, and Andrea Iannone of Italy after qualifying for the Australian Motorcycle Grand Prix at Phillip Island, Australia, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. Marquez took poll ahead of Iannone and Lorenzo. (AP Photo/Rob Griffith) 
MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) — Reigning MotoGP world champion Marc Marquez will start from pole position in Sunday’s Australian Grand Prix after dominating qualifying on Saturday. 
Spain’s Marquez, on a Honda, was fastest in all four sessions over the Phillip Island circuit and finished the second qualifying session 0.316 seconds ahead of Italian Andrea Iannone on a Ducati. Jorge Lorenzo of Spain, riding a Yamaha, was third. 
Lorenzo is 18 points behind Italian teammate and MotoGP championship leader Valentino Rossi, who will start from the second row of the grid in seventh position. 
Marquez had a best lap time of 1 minute, 28.364 seconds to claim his eighth pole of the season, and the 30th of his career despite nursing a fractured hand which he sustained before last week’s Japan Grand Prix. Topics:
